message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.CR. 

The paper deals with communication over a network with a malicious adversary, which is a problem in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves network design and implementation, which falls under the category of computer networks (cs.NI) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper proposes a novel communication scheme that matches an information-theoretically optimal rate, which involves system-level optimization (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with security and adversarial attacks, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR).
